created_at.description: The date and time when the group was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the group was last updated.

default.description: Indicates if the group is set as the default group.

deleted.description: Indicates if the group has been deleted.

description.description: The description or details about the group.

id.description: The unique identifier of the group.

is_public.description: Indicates whether the group is public or private.
